content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia. Thank you for your interest in our apartment. To begin our discussion on the rental price, please propose an amount that you find suitable. Once you share your figure, I'll consider it and respond accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Well, I was thinking of something around 500 euros a month. It's a great location, but it's also an unfurnished apartment, so it's not the most luxurious option.
[[/plot]
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your consideration, Emilia. However, given the prime location, excellent facilities proximity, and the newly built condition of our apartment, I must insist on a slightly higher price. How about we meet at 550 Euros per month? If you find this unacceptable, please let me know your reason for not continuing the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still quite a bit higher than I was initially thinking. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I'm not sure I can justify spending that much. I was hoping for something more in the range of 525 euros.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While I understand your concerns regarding the unfurnished nature of the apartment, I must maintain my stance on the rental price due to its exceptional location and modern construction. Unfortunately, I cannot agree to lower the price to 525 Euros. If you still wish to reconsider for the proposed 550 Euros, please confirm by saying 'I agree to the price of 550 Euros!' Otherwise, state your reason for not continuing the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 550 Euros!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
